main.name: Wayne Ji
main.description: Programmer and analyst with a data driven mindset
main.bio: Chances are if you are reading this, I have applied for a job or you have seen my resume. I just graduated from university in May 2021, and am looking for an opportunity to apply my skills. What I lack in experience I make up with the ability to learn at an accelerated rate with a laser focus and dedication to prove my compentency. My free time includes reading web comics and watching competitive Valorant, or playing the occasional game myself.

resume.skillmessage: Here is how comfortable I am using these skills:

education.school: University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill
education.degree: Bachelors of Science in Statistics and Computer Science
education.description: Spent two and a half years on the wonderful campus of UNC-Chapel Hill, and then the last one and half years of my college career attending Zoom University due to a global pandemic.
